resources.string: "Tap on the script list button and create a new script."
"Tap on the script list button and select a script."
"Do you want to save your changes?"

"Good morning. My name is (name). I have been doing research in Professor Smith's lab over the past three years. I am very excited to explore my career options here and see how my expertise can contribute to the team."
"Hi (name)! I haven't seen you in ages! What have you been up to lately?\nSorry, but I have to get going. It was great chatting with you. Let's get together again sometime!"

"Hello, I am (name). I believe I have three strong points:
First, I am a team player. I am good at boosting morale and I can lead the team to achieve their goals. I once served as captain of the badminton team in university, and our team was the runner-up of the college cup. It was the school team's best result ever.
Second, I am very results-oriented. No matter the field, I can always overcome difficulties in the shortest possible time and achieve goals with a top-notch performance. When I was a project manager at my former company, I was able to meet performance targets for 24 consecutive months.
Finally, I have an entrepreneurial spirit. I am often given the task of handling new businesses. Last season, I introduced "coffee education and training activities" in my former company. It was very successful, and all classes were fully booked until the end of the year.
Based on these characteristics, I believe I can make a great contribution to the company. Thank you."

"Good morning, sir. How may I help you?
Do you have a reservation?
May I have your ID or passport please?
Would you like a single room or a double room?
How many days are you staying?
Please let us know if you need anything else, and have a wonderful stay!"
"Once turned off, the system will not record videos in conversation mode."
"Smile Mirror requires Camera, Microphone, and Storage permissions to show your mirrored image on the screen, and to optionally record video in conversation mode for you to review later."
"Not enough storage space to save the script."
